sub_title: SimCorp Dimension Specialists Team Leader 🧊 We'll make your business operations run faster than ever ⚡
summary:
📧 info@unitso.com  🌐 www.unitso.com
🧊 WHAT WE DO: 
For 17 years Unitso Dimension service center team supports the top tier asset management companies worldwide regarding SimCorp Dimension investment management system. We provide a full range of Dimension services online: project development, maintenance, professional services, concepts audit, consulting, knowledge sharing and client position argumentation

🔬 WHY US:
1. Safety: we operate only in Development & Test Dimension installations so that you keep a full control of Production
2. Effectiveness: our team uses the optimal development approach: Development -> Developer test -> UAT test -> Configuration transport + Documentation for Prod
3. Budget: monthly Unitso subscriptions for Dimension service let you plan your budgets and workload smoothly, receiving the required support on time
4. Value: within your budget we provide you with an access to the entire Unitso Dimension team rather than a single consultant

🚀 THE RESULT: 
Your business operations get automated, what saves your resources and time, providing the unprecedented competitive advantages. Your specialists get the valuable Dimension knowledge so that your business model becomes more independent, ensuring the fast and high quality responds to nowadays challenges.

👓 WHY IT WORKS: 
Our team consists of certified SimCorp Dimension specialists with more than 16 years of experience in Dimension software development, quality assurance, international clients support, professional services and consultancy. We possess the MSc in Mathematics and Banking to provide you with the highest quality analysis of scientific level. Our work experience from SimCorp ensures the practical skills to solve your business operations issues fast and effectively.
We are a team of Dimension developers, and have an experience working with it from inside.

📚 KNOWLEDGE SHARING: 
In Unitso group we regularly share the knowledge about SimCorp Dimension functionality. Feel free to benefit from it in your projects: https://lnkd.in/dR-9mF8

treasury_media.title: Stress Tests and their importance for Solvency
treasury_media.description:
In this post I will tell you a story of the famous SVB (Silicon Valley Bank) collapse as well as will mention the key cures which could safe its solvency.

Best regards,
Sergii Oliinyk
🌏 Unitso - SimCorp Dimension Business Analyst & Project Manager

treasury_media.title: 🧊 Alternative Investments Manager module of SimCorp Dimension: innovations & trends
treasury_media.description:
💡 The alternative/illiquid investments became tremendously popular recently. In the same, its valuation and integration into classical investment portfolios' workflow requires a complex solution. SimCorp released the Alternative Investments Manager module in 2017.

In this post I'll tell you about its innovations & trends.

Best regards,
Sergii Oliinyk
🌏 SimCorp Dimension Business Analyst & Project Manager
#simcorpdimension #dimension #investmentsforecast #alternativeinvestments #unitso

treasury_media.title: How to change yourself?
treasury_media.description:
🤔 Does success let people stay who they are, or can people stay who they truly are only if they get successful? Is it even possible to become a someone else?

I will give you the answers on such sacramental questions in my post.

Best regards,
Sergii Oliinyk

treasury_media.title: How to recognize a true genius and inspiration
treasury_media.description:
This post is about Maryna Viazovska, who has received a Fields Medal (analogue of Nobel Prize for mathematicians) for solving Kepler conjecture for 8 & 24 dimensional spaces. Something that mathematicians all over the world could solve for centuries. 

A few thought regarding how to recognize a true genius in yoursels are also provided.

Best regards,
Sergii Oliinyk
🌏 SimCorp Dimension Business Analyst & Project Manager

projects.description:

•	Do you use Bond Forwards for interest rate risk hedging?

🎯 Results:
•	Save the budgets and manual work/FTEs costs related to acquisition/calculation of daily quotes for OTC derivative Bond Forward
•	Increase your profit by extending the interest rate risk hedging services (e.g. LDI,CDI) for your clients with Bond Forwards, based on reliable and accurate daily valuation (provided by automatic engine)
•	Strengthen your position among competitors in Bond Forward valuation and interest rate risk hedge strategies choice on the market

projects.title: Implementation of duration key ratios in the Portfolio Rebalancing module of SimCorp Dimension
projects.description:
🌟 Goals:

The project requirements referred to implementation of duration key ratios (i.e.Macaulay duration) for model portfolio and calculation of difference in the duration between the client portfolio and model portfolio.  

🎯 Results:

This functionality was successfully delivered in Dimension 4.8 and let the portfolio managers control the duration excess of client portfolio against the model portfolio in the portfolio rebalancing process.

contributors.headline: SimCorp Dimension Specialists Team Leader 🧊 We'll make your business operations run faster than ever ⚡

projects.title: Development of benchmark weights control functionality in the Strategic Asset Allocation and Mandates module of SimCorp Dimension
projects.description:
🌟 Goals:

The project was related to implementation of new functionality in Dimension, that would allow the asset managers to keep the benchmark weights (agreed with their clients) unchanged in case when the model portfolios were changed because of internal decisions of asset managers.

🎯 Results:

This functionality was successfully delivered in Dimension 4.7 and gave the asset managers higher flexibility in their decisions, related to strategic asset allocation and mandates of clients portfolios: it became possible to replace or add the new model portfolios to the strategy despite the benchmark weights reset frequency.

contributors.headline: SimCorp Dimension Specialists Team Leader 🧊 We'll make your business operations run faster than ever ⚡

projects.title: Development of new Value-at-Risk decomposition type in SimCorp Dimension Risk Management module
projects.description:
🌟 Goals:

In line with existing 2 decomposition types of VaR in Dimension ( i.e. decomposition in positions via reporting structure and contribution of risk factors to the total risk) the new decomposition type, which would give a possibility to valuate the risk coming from specific group of risk factors, was requested.

🎯 Results:

This functionality was successfully delivered in Dimension 4.6 and let the risk managers define the exposure to group of specific risk factors, isolate the risk coming from this group and make the decisions regarding diversification of the total risk value.

contributors.headline: SimCorp Dimension Specialists Team Leader 🧊 We'll make your business operations run faster than ever ⚡

projects.title: Documentation of interface between Instrument Valuation and Risk Management modules of SimCorp Dimension
projects.description:
🌟 Goals:

This technical project was dedicated to creation of interface map between instrument valuation and risk management Dimension software modules, which had to be the first step in the movement of  functionality from instrument valuation to risk management module (e.g. Monte-Carlo VaR simulations).

🎯 Results:

This interface map was successfully delivered in Dimension 4.6 and can be used for
- studying process of new developers in the risk management development team
- improvement of risk functionality in Dimension
- transfer of functionality from instrument valuation to risk management module

contributors.headline: SimCorp Dimension Specialists Team Leader 🧊 We'll make your business operations run faster than ever ⚡

projects.title: Development of Relative Value-at-Risk key ratios for reporting structure nodes below the portfolio level in SimCorp Dimension Risk Management module
projects.description:
🌟 Goals:

The idea of the project was to develop a new functionality in the market Risk Management Dimension module, that would allow to calculate the relative (i.e. against benchmark) value-at-risk key ratios (e.g. Relative VaR, Relative IVaR, Relative MVaR, which are based on the risk positions of [Portfolio - Benchmark]) for reporting structures, that contain the split levels (i.e. reporting nodes) below the "Portfolio" split level ( i.e.split by Security ID, split by security Quotation Currency, etc.). 

🎯 Results:

This functionality was successfully delivered in Dimension 4.5 and allows the risk managers to measure the possible loss of the portfolio as excess over the benchmark loss with a specified probability (i.e. confidence level) and time period on security level. Consequently, portfolio managers get the information about appropriate calibration of the portfolio management strategy.

contributors.headline: SimCorp Dimension Specialists Team Leader 🧊 We'll make your business operations run faster than ever ⚡

projects.title: Development of new node reference type for Value-at-Risk key ratios in SimCorp Dimension Risk Management module
projects.description:
🌟 Goals:

The project requirements referred to the development of new functionality in Dimension, which would allow to calculate such reference Value-at-Risk key ratios like Marginal VaR, Incremental VaR, Contribution to Incremental VaR with reference to the top node of the reporting structure instead of the parent node.

🎯 Results:

This functionality was successfully delivered in Dimension 4.5 and allows the risk managers to measure the contribution from holdings and risk factors not only to the parent nodes (i.e. the nodes immediately above) but top node of the reporting structure also. Consequently, it gives the overall information about the impact of every specific holding and risk factor to the total VaR figure.

contributors.headline: SimCorp Dimension Specialists Team Leader 🧊 We'll make your business operations run faster than ever ⚡

profile_positions.description:
In charge of Unitso Dimension service center, that supports the top tier asset management companies worldwide regarding SimCorp Dimension investment management system. We provide such professional services as projects developments, support and consultancy. Our 16 years of experience in SimCorp Dimension industry will ensure that you not only get the best-of-breed results on time, but also receive the reliable knowledge to maintain the constructed innovations further. We operate with SimCorp Dimension Front-to-Back with a focus on the following modules/areas:

📈 Asset Manager & Strategy Manager/Middle Office Manager (Investments forecast)
🚦  Compliance Manager
📠 Trade Manager
🔢 Portfolio Calculations
🎯 Strategy Manager
☂ Risk Management, VaR models (Monte-Carlo/Historical/Parametric/Delta Normal/Delta Gamma/Ex-Ante models), stress tests/market data scenarios
🏅 Performance Management, expected return modelling, FIPA decompositions (revaluation, key ratios, factor based)
🌐 Data Management/Pricing
🤖 Automation & Acceleration of business operations in Dimension
💹 Derivatives implementations (swaps (CDS, longevity, IRS, cross currency, inflation, cleared), swaptions, options, futures, forwards, FRA, IRF, etc.)
🔎 Funds' Look Through data
👁️ Regulations implementations (Solvency 2, ESMA, GIPS, AIFMD, ORSA, SFTR, EMIR, LIBOR reform (including OIS, ESTR, dual curve valuation, UFR), new Dutch pension reform, etc.)
🐾 Index/Benchmark automatic tracking
🛡️ LDI/CDI hedge strategies
💱 Currency overlay/FX Hedging
📐 Formulas & analytics centralization in Dimension
👓 Cash flow forecasting
⌛ Duration ratios (modified, effective, option-adjusted, spread, key rate duration) as well as other sensitivities and market exposures
📊 Reporting/Data import & export (Data Extractors, Data format setups, SQL, Crystal reports, message queues)
📝 Reconciliation

You are welcome to join our Unitso - SimCorp Dimension Expertise group: 👉 lnkd.in/dR-9mF8 👈
profile_positions.title: SimCorp Dimension Team Leader

profile_positions.description:
🎯 On a daily basis we develop and provide the reliable solutions, as well as a solid consultancy expertise to our clients world-wide. The creativity and innovation way of thinking is a core of our success. Within that period I participated in the development of the following solutions in SimCorp Dimension system: 

-	Automatic reporting of Risk Measurement calculated figures, including transformation of weights for Strategic Asset allocation and Mandates investment trees from bottom up to top-down architecture

-	Full audit of risk valuation figures in the automated AIFMD reporting, identifying the issues & solutions, key ratios calculation algorithms, durations & hedge ratios

-	Revision of LDI hedging engine, creating the optimization plan (decreasing the number of locally shocked UFR curves, taking into account derivatives & Look Through properly, optimizing LDI pricing profiles)

-	Pricing profiles harmonization: analysis of all pricing profiles, used across the system, making a plan of how to decrease the number of pricing profiles and centralize them

-	Risk valuation for Look Through data of funds: yield curves and indexes to be used for different instrument types and currencies in Look Through, risk setups

-	Setup risk factors  for securities that experience change name corporate actions in order to keep the risk data in SimCorp Dimension consistent across the time line

-	Analysis of the Strategy Manager module of SimCorp Dimension for FTK and Solvency regulation, as well as investment forecasting

-	VaR integration into Dimension Asset Manager and Compliance Manager modules


📚 Experience:

• Develop & Automate the financial risk reports in SimCorp Dimension: LDI, risk concentration and decomposition, investment structures and SAAM, modelling, TWR and volatility measurements, market data stress scenarios, duration related ratios, Portfolio Calculations setups, Crystal Reports engineering,
AIFMD / Solvency/ FTK reporting automation & compliance
profile_positions.title: SimCorp Dimension specialist -  Business Consultancy & Financial Risk Management

profile_positions.description:
🎯 My responsibility is to ensure that the clients are served with the highest quality of SimCorp Dimension expertise on time. During my assignment I provide the consultancy, engineering, project management and team management services to the top-tier financial institutions of the Netherlands. Working with the best experts in the country constantly supports the further knowledge sharing and professional development within SimCorp Dimension area, providing the unique ecosystem for financial specialists.

📚 Experience:

• Front Office & Compliance:
Asset Manager, Compliance Manager, Portfolio Manager, Portfolio & Index Rebalancing, Trade Manager

• Data Management & reporting:
Financial Instruments (including ETD & OTC derivatives) pricing, data import & export (Data Extractors, Data format setups, SQL, Crystal reports, message queues), key rate durations, DV01, credit spread duration, option-adjusted duration, yield curves (UFR, EONIA, OIS valuation, ESTER), financial exposure (ESMA conventions), price checks, market data validations, market data scenarios

• Market Risk Management:
Risk Measurement, Equity return manager, VaR models: Parametric, Historical, Monte-Carlo, Delta, Ex-Ante key ratios, Expected shortfalls and upsides

• Performance Management:
Model portfolios, Investment structure, SAAM, Performance Measurement, Benchmarks/Index valuations, key ratios (TWR, TE) 

• Transaction settlement & reconciliation:
General reconciliation, transaction STP flow

 • Formulas:
Constructing analytics within formulas for Asset Manager, Compliance Manager, Portfolio Calculations, Data Format Setup, Data Extractor, Portfolio Manager

• Look Through data import/export/analysis:
Setting up the fund decomposition profiles, analyzing the weighting method, pricing, residuals, fund components (including derivatives) valuation: pricing, exposure, duration

• Professional services:
Q&A, system performance, support
